Above all, Dr. King was a man of action. His actions encouraged the actions of so many others, and together, all these individual actions forged a path to a better nation, Bloomberg said. to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government.'' Mr David Cameron made clear he had`` full confidence'' in Mr Andy Coulson and had not pushed him out. During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He can be extremely proud of the role he has played, including for the last eight months in Government.`` I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one.
